name: She is So angry!
description:
you made your wife so angry and she began to throw things from kitchen. Are you skillful enough to avoid all the bowls and mugs and eat edible things?

its an endless game and is on early stages of development. you can play and get score. there is two options: Hide button to hide from dangerous objects.Eat button to  eat  edible things. 

I appreciate playing and post comments about game. i hope you have some fun with this game.
